headline: Jim Cramer on Gartner: “I Don’t Feel Compelled to Stick My Neck Out on This One at All”
summary: Gartner, Inc. (NYSE:IT) is one of the S&P 500 and Nasdaq-100 stocks Jim Cramer commented on. Cramer mentioned the stock during the episode and stated: “Finally, the fifth worst performer in the S&P 500 in 2025 was Gartner, oh my god, this was formerly a really hot stock, the tech research firm down almost 48% […]
